loans.name: Zoila Fabiola

texts.es: Zoila de 55 años de edad es una microempresaria  apasionada por el cuidado personal y la estética femenina, actividad a la que se ha dedicado durante muchos años; desde su juventud trabajó en varios salones de belleza y desde hace diez años se independizó brindando los servicios de peluquería y estética a domicilio actividad que ejecuta de 8:00 a.m. a 8:00 p.m.; su clientela está compuesta por familiares, vecinos del sector donde reside y referidos. Ella está aplicando a su primer Credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo el cual planea invertir en la renovación de su equipo de trabajo; plancha y secador, así mismo invertirá en shampoo, masajes, tintes y demás. Esta  emprendedora tiene muchos planes para seguir creciendo, desea organizar su propia sala de belleza y generar empleo,  teniendo en cuenta  en darles la oportunidad a todas aquellas personas que puedan generar valor a su sueño de prosperidad.
texts.en:
Zoila is 55 years old and a small business owner who is passionate about personal care and feminine beauty, something she has been devoted to for many years. 

Since she was young, she has worked in various beauty salons, and ten years ago she became independent, offering her services as a hairdresser and esthetician in the home. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. 

Her customers are family members, neighbors from the subdivision where she lives, and referred customers. 

She is applying for her first CrediKiva with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She plans to invest it in equipment for her work: a straightening iron and dryer. She’ll also invest in shampoo, massage, dyes and other things. 

This entrepreneur has many plans for continued growth. She wants to open her own beauty salon and create jobs, offering opportunity to all of those people who can create value for her dream of prosperity.

loans.use: to renovate her equipment for work: a straightening iron and dryer, and also to invest in shampoo, massage, dyes and other things.

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en:
Aisha is 33-years-old and lives in the town of Bulenga in the Kampala region of Uganda. She is married and has 3 children with 2 of them currently in school. For the past 5 years, Aisha has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells household items. 

To help expand her business, Aisha has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more household items, and will help Aisha to generate greater profits and grow her business. Aisha hopes that in the future she will be able to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy more household items

loans.name: Higinio De Jesus

texts.es: Higinio de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su dos hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos desde hace 20 años, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños,  con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de abono, herbicida, insecticidas y semillas para poder continuar con su trabajo que le deja muy buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Higinio is 46 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and two children. 

He has been cultivating basic grains for twenty years, and sells his products in surrounding villages. With the income he makes from these sales he manages to cover some of the household expenses. 

He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, weed-killer, pesticides, and seeds in order to continue his work, which provides him with very good profit.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, weed-killer, pesticides, and seeds

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with seven children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like seaweed culturing and rice retailing.

Imelda dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business and save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Kanha

texts.en: Kanha is 22-years-old and lives in Kratie province. She is a mother of a small child and her daily business has been rice farming for four years. The sources of her family’s income are about 56,400 KHR per day. Now she takes her first Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy seeds and fertilizers for her farming. She expects her farmland to get more yields than last year.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for her farming

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy jeans, footwear, and cosmetic products with the goal of expanding her market coverage.

loans.name: Narzullo

texts.ru: Нарзулло молодой мужчина. Ему 29 лет. Заботливый муж и отец двоих детей. Он очень энергичный парень. Всегда стремиться добиться чего то в жизни.  Старается создать все условия, чтобы дети росли достойной жизнью. Раньше Нарзулло работал каменщиком в строительной бригаде. Но пройдя некоторое время его здоровье не позволило ему там работать. У него очень дружная и трудолюбивая семья.  Его жена Мунира дома занимается пошивом национальных платьев. После того как муж остался без работы из за состояния здоровья, муж и жена посоветовавшись начать новый бизнес дома. Бизнес по откорму и купля-продажа мелко рогатого скота. Они купили мелко рогатый скот откармливали и перепродавали. И получили немалый доход. Кроме этого они занимается выращиванием корма для скота, что дает им дополнительный доход. Но в этом году ему не удалось получить хороший урожай. Он хотел часть корма продать и на полученные деньги расширить объем скотоводства. Из-за неблагоприятной погоды намеченный урожай не получил. Поэтому планы продать ячмень и на деньги ячменя купить скот не осуществилось. Не смотря на это он всегда стремился расширить объем своего бизнеса.  И с целью получение кредита он обратился в МДО Арванд. На полученный кредит Нарзулло купить мелко рогатый скот, что в дальнейшем будет перепродать его на удвоенную сумму.
texts.en: Narzullo is a young man. He is 29 years old, a caring husband and the father of two children. He is a very energetic guy. He is always striving to achieve something in life. He tries to create all the conditions for his children to grow up with a decent life. Previously, Narzullo worked as a bricklayer in a construction crew. But after some time, his health did not permit him to work there. He has a very tight-knit and hard-working family. His wife Munira sews national dresses at home. After her husband lost his job due to the state of his health, the husband and wife took advice to start a new business from home. The business is fattening and buying/selling sheep and goats. They would buy sheep and goats, fatten them up and resell them. And they received a considerable income. Apart from this, they grow livestock feed which gives them additional income. But this year he was not able to get a good harvest. He wanted to sell part of the feed and use the money received to expand the scale of his livestock rearing. Due to unfavorable weather he did not get the intended harvest, so his plans to sell barley and use the money from the barley to buy livestock did not work out. But despite all this he has always strived to expand the size of his business, and he has applied to MDO Arvand with the aim of receiving a loan. Narzullo will buy sheep and goats using the received loan that he is going to resell for double the money in future.

loans.use: to buy some livestock.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 39 años es casada cuenta con una linda familia de  ocho hijos de las edades entre 7 y 22 años de edad, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Chichicastenango.
Maria con el afán de generar sus ingresos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de su casa se dedica a la compra y venta de pescado seco, este negocio lo tiene ella desde hace quince años y para mejorar sus ingresos también se dedica a la elaboración de ropa típica.
Maria gracias a la amabilidad con la que atiende a sus clientes, su negocio cuenta con mucha clientela, por tal razón ella solicita un préstamo que lo invertirá en la compra y venta de pescado seco y así poder satisfacer mejor las necesidades de los clientes.
El gran sueño de Maria es poder mejorar sus ingresos y darle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is a 39 year old married woman who has a beautiful family of eight children between the ages of 7 and 22 years old. This modest family lives in the community of Chichicastenango.

Maria works at buying and selling dried fish with the goal of making her own income and supporting her husband with the household expenses. She has had this business for 15 years and to improve this income she also works making traditional clothing.

Thanks to the friendliness with which Maria treats her customers, her business has a large clientele. For that reason she is requesting a loan that she will invest in buying and selling dried fish and thus better satisfy the needs of her customers. Maria's big dream is to be able to improve her income and provide the best for her family.

loans.use: to buy and sell dried fish.

loans.name: Lutfullo

texts.ru: Лутфулло добродушный и трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 46 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Со своей семьёй Лутфулло живут в сельском посёлке. Для того, чтобы иметь доход на проживание Лутфулло занимается своим бизнесом. Вот уже на протяжении 15 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультуру. Затем, когда собирает урожай, вывозит на большой базар и там продаёт свой урожай. Раньше он занимался деканством и потом решил реализовывать свой урожай. Также он работает строителем. как дополнительный доход. У него имеется несколько голов быков, которых он выращивает для дальнейшей продажи. Но сейчас Лутфулло хочет расширить бизнес, именно по выращиванию сельхозкультуры. Но сейчас у него недостаточно собственных денежных средств, чтобы закупить минеральные удобрения. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет взять кредит для покупки минеральные удобрение Лутфулло очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Lutfullo is a kind-hearted and hard-working 46-year-old man. He is married and has two children. Lutfullo and his family live in a rural village. In order to earn a living, Lutfullo runs his own business. He has been growing crops for fifteen years. Then, when he gathers the harvest, he takes it to a large market and sells it there. He used to work on a farm and then decided to sell his own crops. He also works as a builder for additional income. He has a few heads of cattle which he is rearing for sale later. Now Lutfullo wants to expand the crop growing part of his business, but he has insufficient funds at present to buy mineral fertilizer. He has therefore applied to Arvand and wants to take a loan to buy the mineral fertilizer. Lutfullo very much hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
Jose es un hombre  que le agradece mucho el apoyo brindado  pues gracias al crédito el puedo comprar sus semillas de maíz y abono químico, pues gracias a Dios obtuvo muy buena cosecha y con la ganancias que genero logro remodelar su casa. Jose nuevamente solicita un préstamo para poder comprar sus insumos agrícolas para esta temporada que ya se acerca y seguir cultivando para poder obtener  sus ingresos y seguir ayudando a su familia.
El gran sueño de Jose es  que todos sus hijos sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Jose is a man who is very grateful for the support offered, because thanks to the loan, he was able to purchase his corn seeds and chemical fertilizer. Thank God he had a good harvest and with the earnings he generated he was able to remodel his house. 

Jose is once again asking for a loan in order to be able to purchase agricultural inputs for this season, which is approaching, and to be able to continue farming in order to earn income and continue helping his family.

Jose's greatest dream is that all of his children become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es:
Marta es una muchacha de 34 años de edad, vive junto a sus queridos padres en una comunidad de Sololá.
Marta con el objetivo de generar sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la elaboración artículos de bisutería (carteras), esta labor lo realiza ella desde hace tres años.
Marta gracias al empeño que le pone a su trabajo cuenta con muchos  clientes es por ello que se ve a la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo de Q 4,000.00 para poder comprar artículos de bisutería de diferentes colores y estilos para seguir elaborando las carteras.
El gran sueño de Marta es poder ser reconocida como una gran artesana  a nivel nacional.
texts.en:
Marta, age 34, lives with her beloved parents in a community in Solola.  In order to generate income and to get her family ahead, Marta makes personal accessories (purses).  She has been doing this work for three years.

Thanks to the effort that Marta puts into her work, she has a lot of customers.  That is why she sees the need to request a loan for 4,000 GTQ in order to be able to buy different colors and styles of items to continue making the purses.

Marta’s big dream is to be able to be well-known as a great artist on a national level.

loans.use: to buy different colors and styles of personal accessories.

loans.name: Eraida

texts.es: Eraida  tiene la edad de 58 años, está en unión libre    y vive con el esposo y  un  hijo   actualmente. Ella crédito lo quiere para la compra de unos cerdos pequeños y el concentrado para su alimentación .Ella espera poder engordarlos y venderlos con el peso ideal y  así tener mayores ingresos económicos. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo. Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Eraida is 58 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. She currently lives with her partner and her son.

She wants this loan to buy piglets and feed for them. She wants to fatten them and sell them when they reach a good weight in order to have a better income. She hopes that she can offer her family better living conditions and financial stability in the future, and that her business continues to grow.

This is her first loan from FUDECOSUR. She had not received loans from state banks before, but FUDECOSUR offered her this loan more easily and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Erinest

texts.en:
Erinest is 35 years old and lives in the town of Bulenga in the Kampala region of Uganda. He is married and has three children with two of them currently in school. For the past ten years, Erinest has been working hard to manage his brick laying business, which deals in bricks. 

To help expand his business, Erinest has requested a loan of 2,500,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy materials for more bricks, and will help Erinest to generate greater profits and growth of business. Erinest hopes that in the future he will be able to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy materials for more bricks

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is 52 years old and lives in the town of Maganjo in the Luwero region of Uganda. She is married and has three children with one of them currently in school. For the past four years, Mariam has been working hard to manage her catering business, which offers catering services. 

To help expand her business, Mariam has requested a loan of 2,500,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy catering items, and will help Mariam to generate greater profits and improve her family's well-being. Mariam hopes that in the future she will be able to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy catering items

loans.name: Sadaf

texts.ru:
Это Садаф. Она из района Вахш. Ей 44 лет. Садаф замужем и мать одного сына. Сыну 5 лет. Муж занимается мастером по ремонту домов. У нее хороший характер и она приятно общения женщина. Садаф год назад начала заниматься шитьем женской одежды. В начале работы ей было нелегко заниматься швеей. Сейчас у нее хорошо получается, она уже набрала опыта. В день она шьет 2-3 одежды. Садаф шьет одно платье за 25-35 TJS. 
Садаф просит кредит, потому что у нее есть комната, которая она не смогла отремонтировать. Она решила взять кредит и отремонтировать комнату. Садаф на половину сумму от кредита решила купить новую швейную машинку, чтобы улучшить процесс работы и ежедневный доход. Она нуждается на Вашу поддержку. Поддержите Садаф! Она заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en:
This is Sadaf. She is from the Vakhsh region. She is 44 years old. Sadaf is married and the mother of a son. Her son is 5 years old. Her husband is a house renovation foreman. She has a good character and she is a woman that makes agreeable company. One year ago, Sadaf started sewing women's clothes. To begin with it was hard for her to sew. Now she can do it well. She has already gained experience. She sews two or three pieces of clothing in a day. Sadaf sews a dress for 25-35 somoni (TJS).

Sadaf is asking for a loan because she has a room that she was unable to renovate. She has decided to take a loan and renovate the room. With half of the money from the loan, Sadaf will buy a new sewing machine to improve her work and her daily income. She needs your support. Please support Sadaf! She expresses her gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and renovate her room.

loans.name: Rafael Angel

texts.es: Rafael Ángel  tiene la edad de 61 años, está casado y vive con la esposa y tres hijos actualmente. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de materiales como plástico, madera y abono para una siembra de hortalizas  que quieren iniciar. El desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo para que este le permita tener una mayor producción y así tener mayores ingresos económicos. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor. Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Rafael Ángel is 61 years old, married and lives with his wife and three children. The loan he wants is to purchase materials like plastic, wood and manure to grow the vegetables that he wants to start. He wants to provide adequate maintenance to the crops in order to have greater production and thus have higher economic income. He hopes in the future to provide his family with a higher quality of living and greater economic stability and be able to continue to grow as a person and as a producer. This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had other loans from the State Banks and FUDECOSUR is providing the loan with better conditions and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to buy materials and supplies for his garden produce.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Walter

texts.es: Walter tiene la edad  de 44 años, está en unión libre , vive con la esposa  y dos hijos que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende arreglar el camión y poder seguir trabajando ya que el depende de los viajes que realiza con el camión para sacar adelante a su familia y el estudio de los  hijos y  así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y  también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el segundo   préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado los préstamos con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Walter is 44 years old and lives in a common-law marriage with his wife and two children, who are his top priority. With the loan, he hopes to repair his truck and be able to continue working since he depends on the trips he makes with the truck to get his family ahead and pay for his children's education in order to improve his family's living conditions and also achieve some goals. 

This is the second loan that he has received from Fudecosur. He had not ever had other loans from a state bank, but Fudecosur has offered him loans with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: fix his vehicle.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Brayan

texts.es: Bryan Francisco tiene la edad de 19  años, está soltero y vive con los padres actualmente. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de almacigo y abono y dar asistencia a una plantación de café que quieren iniciar. El desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo para que este le permita tener una mayor producción y así tener mayores ingresos económicos. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor. Es el segundo  préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado los  préstamos con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Brayan Francisco is 19 years old, single, and currently lives with his parents.

He wants this loan to buy coffee seedlings and fertilizer, and to perform maintenance on a coffee plantation he wants to start. He wants to give the plantations good attention in order to have a better production and receive a higher income. In the future, he hopes to be able to offer his family better living conditions and financial stability, and be able to continue growing as a person and as a farmer.

This is his second loan from FUDECOSUR. He had not received loans before from state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him loans more easily and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge tiene la edad  de 21 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas, además  comprar algunas plantas de almácigo para hacer resiembras a inicio de lluvias esto con el objetivo de aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.  Es el segundo  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado los préstamos con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Jorge is 21 years old and single. He lives with his parents and siblings, who are his highest priority.

With this loan, he plans to buy fertilizers and fungicides, and some coffee seedlings to replant when the rainy season comes. His goals are to increase the density of plants and make good use of the soil’s fertility and the local weather conditions.

With these improvements to his plantations, he hopes to make more profits in order to improve his family’s living conditions.

This is his second loan from FUDECOSUR. He had not received loans before from state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him loans more easily and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings and farming supplies.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Mahabat

texts.ru: Махабат успешно погасила кредит, она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании.  Благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Махабат, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 4 коровы. Ежемесячный совокупный доход Махабат и ее семьи составляет около 17,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) для закупки теленка и овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Махабат намерена увеличить поголовье, что позволит ей накопить средства на постройку сарая.
texts.en: Mahabat successfully repaid her loan and she is grateful to the Kiva fund and to everyone who helped to finance her. Thanks to her persistence, dedication and hard work, today Mahabat has four cows. Mahabat and her family's gross monthly income is about 17,000 som (KGS). She has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to buy a calf and some sheep to increase the size of her herd. Mahabat intends to increase the herd which will allow her to save up to build a barn.

loans.use: to buy a calf and some sheep in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Constantino

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 25 anos de idade vive maritalmente, é pai de 1 filho menor de idade, responsabiliza-se pela sua irmã que vive em sua casa.
Trabalha numa empresa de agua a mais de 4 anos, onde aufere um valor mensal que aplica nas despesas domesticas, com este empréstimo pretende adquirir material de construção como: área, cimento, chapas de zinco e pedrinhas para dar continuidade a sua obra. Este é o seu 4º empréstimo na hluvuku, sedo que os últimos foram aplicados para mesma actividade.
Futuramente pretende construir um aviário para a criação de frangos para venda e abrir um estabelecimento comercial. O seu maior desafio é concluir a sua obra.
texts.en:
He was born in Namaacha, Maputo province. He is 25 years old and married. He is the father of an underage son and maintains her sister, who lives with him. He has been working for a water company for more than four years. With the salary he earns, he covers the home expenses.

With this loan, he plans to buy construction materials such as sand, cement, zinc sheets and gravel to continue the works. This is his fourth loan from Hluvuku. He used the previous ones for the same activity.

In the future, he plans to build a pen to raise chickens and sell them, and open a commercial establishment. His biggest challenge is to finish the construction works.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, zinc sheets and gravel.

loans.name: Mirzorahmat

texts.ru: Мирзорахмат  добродушный и трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 38 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Со своей семьёй Мирзорахмат живут в сельском посёлке. Для того, чтобы иметь доход на проживание Мирзорахмат  занимается своим бизнесом. Вот уже на протяжении 10 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультуры. Затем, когда собирает урожай, вывозит на большой базар и там продаёт свой урожай. Раньше он занимался деканством и потом решил реализовывать свой урожай. У него имеется несколько голов быков, которых он выращивает для дальнейшей продажи. Но сейчас Мирзорахмат  хочет расширить бизнес, именно по выращиванию сельхозкультуры. Но сейчас у него недостаточно собственных денежных средств, чтобы закупить минеральные удобрения. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет взять кредит для покупки минеральных удобрений. Мирзорахмат  очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Mirzorahmat is a kind-hearted and hard-working 38-year-old man. He is married and has two children. Mirzorahmat and has family live in a rural village. Mirzorahmat runs his own business in order to earn a living. He has been growing crops for ten years. When he gathers the harvest he takes it to a large market and sells it there. He previously worked on a farm and then decided to sell his own crops. He has a few heads of cattle which he is rearing for sale in future. Now Mirzorahmat wants to expand the crop growing part of his business, but he does not have enough of his own money to buy mineral fertilizer. He has therefore applied to Arvand and wants to take a loan to buy the mineral fertilizer. Mirzorahmat is very hopeful of a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer to treat his land.

loans.name: Pedro Jose

texts.es: Pedro José  tiene la edad de 48 años, está soltero   y vive con  los padres    actualmente. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de unos novillos de engorde .El espera poder engordarlos y venderlos con el peso ideal y  así tener mayores ingresos económicos. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo. Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Pedro José is 48 years old, single, and currently lives with his parents. He wants the loan to purchase some calves for fattening. He hopes to be able to fatten them and sell them at the ideal weight and thus have higher income.

He hopes to be able to offer his family a better quality of life and greater economic stability in the future, and to be able to continue growing.

This is the first loan he has received from Fudecosur. He had not had any other loans from state banks before, but Fudecosur has offered him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Bakhodur

texts.ru: Баходур жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 42 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. У него очень дружная семья. Живут они в сельской местности. Чтобы иметь доход в семье, все члены семьи пытаются как-то зарабатывать деньги. Каждый трудится как может. Основным и стабильным бизнесом Баходур является животноводство. Он разводит и продаёт скот. В этом деле ему помогает жена. Она ухаживает за скотом, а также продаёт полученное от скота молоко. Бизнес животноводства приносит Баходур хороший и стабильный доход. Поэтому он желает расширить этот бизнес. Ему необходимо купить ещё несколько голов скота для выращивания и дальнейшей продажи. Для этого Баходур обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Он надеется, что этот бизнес будет успешно расширяться и приносить больше прибыли, чтобы качественно удовлетворять нужды семьи. Баходур заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Bakhodur is a cheerful 42-year-old man. He is married and has two children. He has a very tight-knit family. They live in a rural location. In order to have income for the family, each family member tries to earn money somehow. Each of them works however they can. Bakhodur's main and stable business is rearing animals. He breeds and sells cattle. His wife helps him with this. She looks after the cattle and also sells the milk they get from them. The animal rearing business brings Bakhodur a good and stable income. He has therefore decided to expand this business. He needs to buy a few more heads of cattle to raise and sell in future. Bakhodur has applied to Arvand for this and wants to receive a loan to buy the cattle. He hopes that this business will grow successfully and bring more profits in order to satisfy well the needs of his family. Bakhodur thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to buy some cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for his education fees.

loans.name: Nuria

texts.es: Nuria   tiene la edad de 50 años, está divorciada    y  vive con  los  hijos   actualmente. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de dos  unas  vacas de cría.Ella espera que  estas vacas traigan crías y están crezcan saludables y poder venderlas   y  así tener mayores ingresos económicos. Ella espera en un futuro brindarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo. Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Nuria is 50 years old, divorced, and currently lives with her children. She wants the loan to purchase two breeding cows. She hopes these cows bring calves and that they grow healthy in order to sell them and thus have higher income. 

She hopes to offer her children a better quality of life and greater economic stability in the future, and to be able to continue growing. 

This is the first loan she has received from Fudecosur. She has not had other loans from state banks before, but Fudecosur has offered her the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Leticia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Leticia  siempre supo que quería ser dueña de un negocio. Por ello a sus 19 años inició una pulpería en su comunidad, gracias a la ayuda de su esposo y su hermano que reside en los Estados Unidos.  Con el tiempo ha ido ampliándola y ganando más clientes. Así como ha podido aportar a la economía de su hogar. 

Sin embargo, solicita un préstamo para comprar, gaseosas, golosinas, carnes, productos lácteos, granos básicos, papel higiénico. Esto le será de ayuda porque podrá ofrecer variedad e incrementaran sus ingresos. Leticia planea abrir un nuevo local en una zona más transitada y mejorar su vivienda con las ganancias.
texts.en:
Leticia has always known that she wanted to be the owner of a business. So, at age 19, she opened a general store in her community, thanks to the support of her husband and her brother who lives in the United States. With time, she has expanded it and earned more customers. She has also been able to support the household economy.

However, she asks for a loan to purchase soft drinks, candies, meat, dairy products, basic grains, and toilet paper. This will help her because she will be able to offer variety and increase her income. Leticia plans to open a new retail space in a busier area and improve her house with the earnings.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, candies, meat, dairy products, basic grains, and toilet paper.

loans.name: Allan Francisco

texts.es:
Su amor por ayudar a las personas, convirtió a Allan en estudiante de la licenciatura en enfermería a sus 23 años de edad. Su felicidad la refleja a la hora de ver que sus pacientes en el hospital donde trabaja, salgan muy bien de salud. Afortunadamente cuenta con el apoyo de su madre que es estadista del ministerio de salud, pues siempre ha estado ahí para todos sus progresos personales y académicos. 
Allan ya está haciendo prácticas en un hospital, sin embargo, él ya quiere salir a trabajar oficialmente como doctor, por lo que solicita un préstamo para pagar su curso de titulación, el título y su graduación. Esto además de crecer profesionalmente, podrá tener mayores oportunidades en lo laboral. En sus planes está especializarse y tener nuevas oportunidades de trabajo.
texts.en:
His love of helping people made Allan into a nursing student at age 23. His happiness is shown when he sees his patients at the hospital where he works leave in good health. Fortunately, he has the support his mother who is a statistician in the ministry of health, and she has always been there for his personal and academic progress.

Allan is now doing his internship in a hospital, however, he wants to go out to work officially as a doctor, so he asks for a loan to pay to register his degree, the diploma, and his graduation. In addition to growing professionally, he will be able to to have better work opportunities. In his plans are to specialize and have new work opportunities.

loans.use: to pay to register his degree, the diploma and graduation.

loans.name: Sugey Aracely

texts.es:
Suyen siempre se ha caracterizado por ser responsable y emprendedora. A sus 22 años se decidió  iniciar una pequeña  pulpería en su casa. Los comienzos nunca son fáciles pero gracias al apoyo de sus padres Suyen, pudo superar las adversidades que se le presentaron. Actualmente, ha podido ampliarla y ha generado más ingresos, que le han  le ha servido para aportar dinero extra a su hogar. 

Sin embargo, solicita un préstamo para comprar carnes, leche, crema, gaseosas, golosinas, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, cebolla, aceite. Esto le será de mucha ayuda porque podrá ofrecer mayor variedad de productos, en consiguiente atraerá a más clientes. Sueyen planea mejorar la infraestructura de su local y abrir otro local.
texts.en:
Suyen has always been characterized as being responsible and enterprising. At 22 years old, she decided to open a small general store in her house. The beginnings were never easy, but thanks to her parents' support, Suyen was able to overcome the difficulties that came up. Currently, she has been able to expand it and has generated more income, which has served to provide extra money for the home. 

However, she asks for a loan to purchase meat, milk, cream, soft drinks, candy, sugar, rice, beans, onion, and oil.  This will be a great help because she will be able to offer a greater variety of products, and then will attract more customers. Suyen plans to improve the infrastructure of her retail space and open another store.

loans.use: to purchase meat, milk, cream, soft drinks, candies, sugar, rice, beans, onions, and oil.

loans.name: Karla Verónica

texts.es:
El deseo de superarse y de ofrecerle mejores oportunidades a su hija, impulsó a Karla a continuar su educación superior. Esta mujer de 25 años, está a un paso de graduarse de contabilidad pública y auditoria, gracias al apoyo de su familia, que la ha ayudado en todo el trascurso de su carrera universitaria. Karla es proactiva, responsable y solidaria, por ello actualmente trabaja y estudia, a la vez.  

Sin embargo, solicita un préstamo para pagar los gastos de un seminario  de titulación. Esto le será de mucha ayuda porque solo eso le falta para ser egresada e iniciar su vida laboral, en su campo de estudio.
texts.en:
The desire to improve herself and offer her daughter better opportunities pushed Karla to continue her higher education. This woman, 25 years old, is one step away from graduating with a degree in public accounting and auditing, thanks to the support of her family who has helped her throughout her entire university career. Karla is proactive, responsible, and supportive, so she is currently working and studying at the same time.

However, she asks for a loan to pay for the expenses of registering her degree. This will be a great help because this is all she has left to do to become a graduate and begin her work life in her field of study.

loans.use: to pay the expenses of registering her degree.

loans.name: Francisco Adalid

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre responsable, soñador y perspicaz. Siempre se mantiene haciendo algo y sus aspiraciones profesionales cada vez se encuentran a un paso de hacerse realidad. Él es padre de 4 hijos, que ha sabido sacar adelante y ofrecerles muchas oportunidades de crecimiento. 

Sin embargo, solicita un préstamo para pagar una maestría en teología eclesiástica, esto le será de mucha ayuda  porque podrá desarrollar sus conocimientos y habilidades en esa área de su carrera. El planea ganarse un puesto de docente fijo en una universidad de la región.
texts.en:
Francisco is a responsible, visionary and insightful man. He has always wanted to support himself doing something, and his professional aspirations have always found a path to make themselves come true. He is the father of 4 children, who has known how to get ahead and offer them many opportunities for growth.

However, he asks for a loan to pay for a masters degree in ecclesiastical theology. This will be of great help, because he will be able to develop his knowledge and skills in this area. He plans to get a job as a permanent instructor at a university in the region.

loans.use: to pay for a masters degree in ecclesiastical theology.

loans.name: Cinthia Argentina

texts.es:
La sonrisa de Cinthia, es una de las muestras de lo orgullosa que se siente por estar en cuarto año de Ingeniería Acuícola, con tan solo veinte años de edad. Esta aventurera se dejó llevar por lo nuevo y conocer más sobre la camaronicultura, el manejo de recursos costeros y de las granjas integrales policultivo, pues además de aprendizaje miró bastantes oportunidades de trabajo en este campo.
Cinthia siempre ha contado con el apoyo incondicional de sus padres, siendo su mamá enfermera y su papá pensionado.  Sostén que le ha servido ser una de las mejores alumnas. Estando en los últimos años de la carrera, las asignaciones han crecido, razón suficiente porque solicita un préstamo para comprar una computadora para no tener ningún obstáculo para cumplir con sus deberes académicos. En sus planes está especializarse en otras ramas de su carrera y culminar sus estudios para empezar a trabajar y apoyar a sus padres.
texts.en:
Cinthia's smile is one example of the pride she feels by being in her fourth year of aquaculture engineering while only being 20 years old. This adventure allows her to move to something new and learn more about shrimp farming, the management of coastal resources and integrated policulture farms. In addition to the learning, she has seen many job opportunities in this field. 
Cinthia has always had the unconditional support of her parents. Her mother is a nurse and her father is retired. This support has helped her to be one of the best students. She is in the last years of her degree and her assignments have increased. This is reason enough to request a loan to purchase a computer so that she will not have any obstacles in completing her academic duties. With her plans, she will specialize in  other branches of her field and finish her studies so she can start working and support her parents.

loans.use: purchase a computer

loans.name: Olinda

texts.es:
Olinda, de 32 años de edad, es ama de casa y estudio hasta tercer grado, no continuo sus estudios porque sus padres ya no pudieron ayudarle económicamente y decidieron enseñarle a trabajar, está acompañado y junto a su pareja tienen 2 hijos de 14 y 7 años de edad, los cuales se encuentran estudiando, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.

Olinda, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 7 años, trabajo que lo aprendió gracias a su padre, también tiene un pequeño molino con el cual obtiene ingresos extras; para llegar al trabajo de la agricultura camina medio kilometro y su horario es de 6:00 a.m. a 11:00 a.m.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar fertilizantes, abono, semilla, veneno para el cultivo de maíz y pipián y para prepara la tierra, para logarar obtener una buena cosecha.

El sueño de Olinda, es ahorrar para darles a sus hijos la oportunidad que estudien en la universidad y sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Olinda, 32 years old, is a housewife and went to school up to the third grade. She didn't continue her education because her parents could no longer support her economically and they decided to teach her how to work. She is partnered and with her partner has two children, ages 14 and 7, who are students. Her husband works in agriculture.

Olinda has worked in agriculture for the past 7 years, work that she learned thanks to her father. She also has a small mill with which she gets additional income. To get to the agricultural work, she walks a half kilometer and her work schedule is from 6:00 am to 11:00 am.

The loan that she is requesting is to purchase fertilizers, manure, seeds, and pesticides for the corn and pumpkin squash and to prepare the land, to manage to get a good harvest. 

Olinda's dream is to save up to give her children the opportunity to study at the university and become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, manure, seeds, and pesticides for the corn and pumpkin crop, and to prepare the land.

loans.name: Gulchehrai

texts.ru: 23 летняя девушка Гулчехраи. Она замужем и мать одного ребенка. Гулчехраи живет вместе мужем, отцом, матерью, сестренкой и ребенком. Она рукодельница. Гулчехраи 3 года назад научила шить и кроить женскую одежду. Она занимается шитьем женской национальной одежды, и зарабатывает, помогает родителям обеспечить семью. Ей в работе помогает ее сестренка. Гулчехраи умная и самостоятельная девушка. Она ведет домашнее хозяйство, ухаживает о ребенке и одновременно ведет свое дело. Гулчхраи хочет поменять  швейную машинку. Она собирается купить многофункциональную швейную машинку, чтобы расширить деятельность.  С помощью новой швейной машинки Гулчехраи может шить  больше и привлечь себе больше клиентов.  С такими планами Гулчехраи нуждается на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: This 23-year-old young woman is called Gulchehrai. She is married and the mother of one child. Gulchehrai lives with her husband, father, mother, sister and child. She is a seamstress. Three years ago Gulchehrai began to cut and sew women's clothing. She sews women's national dress to earn money and helps her parents to provide for the family. Her sister helps her work. Gulchehrai is a clever and independent young woman. She looks after the home, cares for her child and at the same time runs her business. Gulchehrai wants to change her sewing machine. She is preparing to buy a multi-functional sewing machine in order to expand her business. With the help of the new sewing machine, Gulchehrai will be able to sew more and attract more clients. Gulchehrai needs your support with these plans.

loans.use: to buy a multi-functional sewing machine.

loans.name: Jose Alejandro

texts.es:
José, de 23 años de edad, es jornalero, estudio hasta sexto grado, no continuo sus estudios porque decidió aprender a trabajar, para ayudarle a sus padres económicamente en los gastos de la casa; está acompañado y aún no tienen hijos.

José y su esposa se dedican a la agricultura desde hace 5 años, este oficio lo aprendió con su mamá, quien siempre se ha dedicado a esto; para llegar hasta su lugar de trabajo tiene que viajar en bicicleta y su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 a.m. a 1:00 p.m. todos los días.

José, utilizará el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono, semilla, insecticidas y preparar la tierra, con el préstamo lograra cubrir sus necesidades.
 
El sueño de José, es poder comprar un terreno para construir su propia casa y poder tener sus hijos para darles una buena educación y prepararlos para que puedan ser profesionales.
texts.en:
José, 23 years old, is a day laborer. He went to school up to the sixth grade, and didn't continue his education because he decided to learn how to work, to help his parents economically with the household expenses. He is partnered and doesn't have any children yet. 

José and his wife have worked in agriculture for the past 5 years. This work he learned with his mother, who has always done it. To get to the place where he works, he has to travel by bicycle and his work schedule is 6:00 am to 1:00 pm every day.

José will use the loan to purchase agricultural supplies such as manure, seeds, and insecticides and to prepare the land. With the loan, he will be able to cover his needs. 

José's dream is to be able to purchase land and build his own house and to be able to have his children to provide them with a good education and prepare them so that they can be professionals.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as manure, seeds, and insecticides and to prepare the land.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un joven de 20 años de edad, es soltero vive junto a sus queridos padres en una comunidad de Sololá.
Francisco con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y apoyar a sus padres con los gastos de la casa se dedica al cultivo de papa, repollo y zanahoria, esta labor lo realiza el desde hace 10 años. Pero para mejorar sus ingresos también se dedica  a enderezado y pintado de carros.
Francisco  es un joven que le preocupa mucho no cultivar en esta temporada pues es de lo que el obtiene sus ganancias, por tal razón solicita un préstamo para poder pagar la mano de obra  y compra de insumos agrícolas.
Francisco anhela poder contar con su propio taller y comprar un terreno para poder cultivar en ella.
texts.en:
Francisco is a young man, 20 years old, who is single and lives with his beloved parents in a community in Sololá.

Francisco, with the desire to get his income and support his parents with the household expenses, works growing potatoes, cabbage, and carrots. He has done this work for the past 10 years. But, to increase his income, he also works on dent removal and painting cars. 

Francisco is a young man who is quite concerned about not being able to plant this season since this is how he gets his income. For this reason, he asks for a loan to be able to pay labor costs and purchase agricultural supplies. 

Francisco wants to be able to have his own workshop and purchase land to be able to cultivate it.

loans.use: to pay labor costs and purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Hanzel Guilllermo

texts.es:
A medida que pasa el tiempo, la tecnología ha venido a revolucionar, dato que Hanzell miró necesario para estudiar Ingeniería en telemática y ser parte de este mundo vanguardista. A sus veinte años de edad, se siente muy feliz de cursar el tercer año de su carrera y ser parte de este mundo cibernético que ayuda al progreso del mundo. 
La familia de Hanzell se siente muy orgullosa de él, por lo que no lo dudan en ayudarlo cuando lo necesita, en especial su abuela que tiene negocio propio y su tío que envía remesas. Dado a que su carrera requiere estar a la vanguardia con la tecnología, solicita un préstamo para comprar una computadora, herramienta primordial para su ingeniería. En sus planes está sacar una especialidad y obtener un buen trabajo para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
As time has passed, technology has caused a revolution, so that Hanzell saw it as necessary to study engineering and telematics and be part of this vanguard world. At twenty years old, he is very happy to be in his third year of his program and be part of this cyber world which helps the world to progress.

Hanzell's family is very proud of him, so they don't hesitate to help him when necessary, especially his grandmother who has her own business and his uncle who sends remittances. Since his degree requires him to be on the forefront with technology, he asks for a loan to purchase a computer, a basic tool for his engineering. In his plans are to specialize and get a good job to help his family.

loans.use: to purchase a computer.

loans.name: Vazha

texts.en:
Vazha is a 65-year-old married man from the capital of Georgia. He lives with his wife. The family belongs to the subsistence poor category, as they have no source of income and live in poverty. Because of the above mentioned situation, Vazha lacks the access to capital markets and financial institutions to obtain credit for starting a business, as they require stable income and business experience. The Start Up program created by Kiva and Credo enabled him to get a loan of 3,000 USD. Vazha will purchase a second-hand car and will start providing taxi service. He will transfer people through the town and also in other regions. He will become the only breadwinner in the family and tackle the poverty.

The family's living conditions will significantly improve, and the family will have enough income to access regular credit products available on the country’s capital market, in case of need.

loans.use: to purchase a car and make his taxi service their only source of income.

loans.name: Lenah

texts.en:
Lenah is 28 years old, married to Julius and supports three children.She has been practicing small scale farming for the last eight years, earning 9,000 KES per month. 

Lenah has applied for her first loan of 25,000 KES from Vision Fund Kenya to buy farm inputs and seedlings to use for high production and sell to gain  more income. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to educate her children to high levels. Her future hopes and plans are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs and seedlings to use for high production and sell to gain more income

loans.name: Anni Belinda Anai

texts.es: La señora Anni de 31 años de edad convive con el señor Elías más de 6 años, tiene 3 hijos dependientes de diferentes edades, la familia vive en una zona urbana, la señora se dedica al negocio de venta de salchipapas durante el año escolar y comercio de venta de mercadería (Juguetes navideños, carnavaleras globos, en San Juan juegos pirotécnicos y otros dentro de las fiestas que hay dentro del año), su esposo actualmente es albañil y se dedica a la construcción, de esta forma se mantienen económicamente durante el año, a veces los ingresos del esposo no les abastece ya que están haciendo construir su casa propia y el ahorro que tenían lo invirtieron, por este motivo la señora requiere un crédito para la compra de mercadería para incrementar las ventas de su negocio y a su vez mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Anni is 31 years old. She lives with Elias, her common-law husband for over 6 years. She has three dependent children of various ages. The family live in the urban zone. She sells hot dogs and fries (salchipapas) during the school year, as well as sells various merchandise (Christmas toys, carnival balloons, fireworks in San Juan and for other festivities during the year.) Her husband is a bricklayer and works in construction. This is how they support themselves during the year. Sometimes her husband's income is not enough because they are building their own house and the saving they had were invested on it. Thus Mrs. Anni is asking for a loan to buy merchandise to increase her sales and to improve her earnings.

loans.use: To buy merchandise to increase sales and improve her earnings.

loans.name: Maximiliano

texts.es:
Maximiliano es hombre de 45 años de edad es casado tiene una linda familia de siete hijos de las edades  entre 4 y 25 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de San Antonio Palopó.
Maximiliano con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia trabaja como jornalero, esta actividad lo realiza el desde hace seis meses  y para generar  otros ingresos también se dedica a la pesca.
Maximiliano ahora se ve a la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo  para poder comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, hierro y arena para la construcción de un dormitorio, pues a pesar de todos sus esfuerzos y sacrificios por varios años no le ha sido posible construirlo.
Maximiliano espera contar con el préstamo para poder realizar la construcción  y darle a su familia un mejor hogar.
texts.en:
Maximiliano is a 45-year-old man. He is married and has a beautiful family with seven children between 4 and 25 years old. This humble family lives in the community of San Antonio Palopó.

Maximiliano—with the desire to earn an income and take his family forward—works as a day laborer. He has done this work for six months and to generate additional income, he also fishes. 

Maximiliano now sees the need to request a loan so that he can buy construction materials, such as cement, iron, and sand, to build a room, since despite all of his effort and sacrifices for many years, he has not been able to build it. 

Maximiliano hopes to have the loan so that he can do the construction and give his family a better home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, such as cement, iron, and sand.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 51 years old and married with eight children, three of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase items like shampoo, soap, milk, coffee, canned goods, chips, etc. Marilou has been in this business for 5 years.

In the future Marilou would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase items like shampoo, soap, milk, coffee, canned goods, chips, etc.

loans.name: Eria

texts.en:
Eria is 40 years old and lives in the town of Maganjo in the Luwero region of Uganda. He is married and has 4 children, with 3 of them currently in school. 

For the past 7 years, Eria has been working hard to manage his wholesale business, which operates as a wholesale shop. 

To help expand his business, Eria has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more items for the shop, and will help Eria to generate greater profits and increase on stock. Eria hopes that in the future he will be able to set up a new branch.

loans.use: to buy more items for the shop

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.pt:
O senhor Aurelio é pensionista, casado , pai de 5 filhos dos quais 3 já são maiores e independentes,  e 2 frequentam o ensino primário, vive em casa própria ainda em construção.

Com o valor do credito pretende comprar, cimento, pranchas, chapas de zinco, barrotes, ferros, para dar continuidade da sua obra.
O cliente tem como sonho, concluir e ampliar a sua obra para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família
Os principais desafios são financeiros tem estado a trabalhar pretende tomar mais vezes o credito para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos.
texts.en:
Mr Aurelio is a pensioner, married and the father of 5 children, 3 of whom are of age and independent and 2 who go to school. He lives in a house he owns which is still under construction.

With this loan he plans to buy cement, planks, zinc plates, beams and iron to continue the building work.

He dreams of finishing and expanding his house to offer a better home for his family.
His main challenges are financial so he has been working. He intends to request further loans to ease his difficulties and reach his objectives.

loans.use: buy cement, planks, zinc plates, beams and iron to continue the building work

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is 36 years old and lives in the town of Kasubi in the Kampala region of Uganda. She is married and has 4 children who are all currently in school.

For the past 5 years, Rosemary has been working hard to manage her rentals business, which operates accommodation rental houses. 

To help expand her business, Rosemary has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to build more rentals, and will help Rosemary to generate greater profits and increase family income. Rosemary hopes that in the future she will be able to have more rentals.

loans.use: to build more rentals

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius comes from Iryangabi ii. He is married with 5 children.

He is requesting a loan of 1,500,000 UGX to assist him in buying fertilizers for his coffee plantation for better yields and therefore increased income. Julius deals in coffee planting and trade.

His challenge is the draught that hits them and he ends up harvesting nothing during the season. Julius hopes to build a good shelter for the family. He appreciates the Kiva support.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge, de 51 años de edad, es agricultor y estudio hasta sexto grado, no puso seguir estudiando debido al conflicto armado, está acompañado y junto a su pareja tienen tres hijos, de los cuales uno se encuentra estudiando, 2 están acompañados y trabajan para sus hogares, vive con su esposa y uno de sus hijos, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar.

Jorge, trabaja en el verano manejando una moto taxi y en el invierno se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 15 años, trabajo que lo aprendió con su padre quien siempre se ha dedicado a este negocio, pero también es carbonero, ese oficio lo aprendió de un amigo, para llegar a su trabajo Jorge, viaja 5 kilómetro desde su casa y su horario es de 6:00 a.m. a 12:00 del mediodía.

El préstamo que está solicitando es para comprar insumos agrícolas como semilla, abono, veneno, etc. para obtener una buena cosecha y así lograr tener un poco mas de ingresos.

Su sueño es, poder tener 42,000 metros cuadrados de terreno, para sembrar granos básicos y tener dos vacas lecheras; además, desea que su hijo pueda salir adelante, para que pueda ser un profesional.
texts.en:
51-year old Jorge is a farmer. He has a grade 6 education but could not continue school because of the war. He is married; he and his wife have three children, one of whom is a student and the other two are married and have jobs. He lives with his wife and one of his children. His wife looks after the home.

Jorge works in the summer driving a motobike taxi and in the winter he works in the fields. He’s been a farmer for 15 years and learned his skills from his father who has always been a farmer. Jorge is also a charcoal maker, a job he learned from a friend. To get to work, he travels 5 km from his house. His workday runs from 6 am to noon.

The loan he is seeking is to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, manure, pesticide etc. so he can have a good harvest and earn a little bit more money.

Jorge’s dream is to own 42,000 m2 of land and plant basic grains and have two cows for milk. He also wishes to see his son make progress so he can get a good job.

loans.use: buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, manure, pesticide etc.

loans.name: Belinha

texts.pt:
A senhora Belinha de 56 anos de idade, solteira, comerciante vende diversos produtos da primeira necessidade em sua casa,  mãe de 6 filhos maiores de idade e independentes, vive na casa própria.

Com o valor do credito pretende comprar, cimento, pranchas, chapas de zinco, barrotes, ferros, pedra, para aumentar mais um quarto na sua casa.
O cliente tem como sonho ampliar e concluir  a sua e ampliar o seu negocio.
Os principais desafios são financeiros tem estado a trabalhar pretende tomar mais vezes o credito para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos.
texts.en:
Ms Belinha is 56 years old, single and a trader of various types of essential products which she sells from her home. She's the mother of 6 children who are of age and independent and lives in a house she owns.

With this loan she plans to buy cement, planks, sheets of zinc, beams, iron and stone to add a room onto her house.

Her dream is to add to her home and expand her business.
Her main challenges are financial and she has been working. She plans to take out further loans in future to overcome her difficulties and reach her objectives.

loans.use: buy cement, planks, sheets of zinc, beams, iron and stone to add a room onto her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy various types of beer and sodas to reinforce her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy three bags of rice, two jugs of salad oil, sodas, dairy products etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy chemical fertilizer and fungicide

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le  ha pixeleado la cara por tener 21 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica desde hace 10 años a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, el joven vive en casa propia con sus padres y su hermano, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
This young man’s face has been pixelated because he lives in a high risk area. He is 21 years old and has earned his living for ten years growing maize and sorghum. He sells the crops in nearby towns and has many regular customers. He lives in his own house with his parents and brother.

Now he is seeking a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pesticide and herbicide etc. so he can improve the land which can be seen in the photograph. Then he will be able to continue as a farmer which is his sole source of income and earn more money.

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pesticide and herbicide etc.

loans.name: Irene

texts.pt:
A senhora Irene de 38 anos de idade,  solteira, comerciante vendendo frutas e mariscos,  mãe de 2 filhos dos quais 1 já e maior de idade e independente,  e 1 frequenta o ensino secundário vive em casa própria.

Com o valor do credito pretende comprar, cimento, pranchas, chapas de zinco, barrotes, ferros, pedra, para dar continuidade da sua obra.
O cliente tem como sonho, concluir e ampliar a sua obra para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família, e futuramente comprar uma viatura para o seu dia-a-dia.
Os principais desafios são financeiros tem estado a trabalhar pretende tomar mais vezes o credito para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos
texts.en:
Ms Irene is 38 years old, single and sells fruit and seafood. She's the mother of 2 children, 1 of whom is of age and independent and the other goes to high school. She lives in a house she owns.

With this loan she plans to buy cement, planks, sheets of zinc, beams, iron and stone to continue the building work on her home.

Her dream is to complete and expand her house to offer her family a better home and in future to buy a vehicle for day-to-day use.
Her main challenges are financial and she has been working. She plans to take out further loans in future to overcome her difficulties and reach her objectives.

loans.use: buy cement, planks, sheets of zinc, beams, iron and stone to continue the building work on her home

loans.name: Feliciana

texts.es:
La socia Feliciana se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales,tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de productos de primera necesidad y elaboracion de artesanias, la socia cria cuyes y gallinas, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere poner su tienda de abarrotes ya que es su sueño tener su propio negocio, la socia también quiere tener un lugar más amplio para que pueda vender sus animales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y también alimentos para los animales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Feliciana continues working on her business raising animals. She also continue working on her business sell basic-need products and making handicrafts. She raises guinea pigs and hens. Through this business, she wants to open a grocery store, since it is her dream to have her own business. She also wants to have a more spacious location, so that she can sell her animals. 

She requests the loan to buy guinea pigs and hens, as well as food for the animals.

She is happy with the loan and promises to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and hens, as well as food for the animals.

loans.name: Yanina

texts.es: Yanina de 24 años creció en una familia dedicada a la cría de semovientes, razón por la que decidió continuar con este legado obteniendo excelentes resultados que ha logrado gracias a su esfuerzo y compromiso.   Hoy en día cuenta con cinco años de experiencia en la cría y comercialización de ganado caprino y porcino, que ofrece a comerciantes de la Región Caribe, ella se dedica a esta actividad de 6 a.m. a 2 p.m. y vende semanalmente los animales, adicionalmente elabora quesos, receta que aprendió de sus ancestros y distribuye a sus clientes en el barrio donde reside al sur occidente de Barranquilla. Con la finalidad de realizar unas adecuaciones a las parcelas, está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en madera, alambre y clavos. Yanina desea graduarse y continuar sus estudios en busca de un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Yanina is 24 years old. She grew up in a family dedicated to raising livestock, which is why she decided to continue with this legacy. She has gotten excellent results and has succeeded thanks to her effort and commitment. 

She now has five years of experience in raising and selling goats and pigs. She sells the animals to merchants in the Caribe region. She is dedicated to this work from 6:00am to 2:00pm, and she sells the animals weekly. 

She also makes cheeses from a recipe she learned from her ancestors. She distributes the cheese to her clients in the neighborhood where she lives in the southwestern part of Barranquilla. 

With the goal of making some improvements to her land, she is applying for her first Kiva loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will invest in wood, wire, and nails. 

Yanina wants to graduate from school and continue her education in search of a better future.

loans.use: to invest in wood, wire, and nails.

loans.name: Katy Dinora

texts.es:
Katy, de 30 años de edad, es cosmetóloga, estudio hasta séptimo grado, no continuo sus estudios porque decidió acompañarse, junto con su compañero de vida tienen 2 hijos de 9 y 5 años edad, de los cuales solo uno se encuentra estudiando, su compañero de vida se dedica a trabajar por jornadas.

Katy, se dedica a vender productos de belleza en los alrededores de la comunidad, este trabajo lo realiza desde hace varios años, decidio hacerlo para ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos del hogar, para ofrecer su producto trabaja en el horario de 1:00 p.m. a 4:00 p.m.

El crédito que está solicitando es para complementar un dinero para comprar una motocicleta, para que su esposo pueda trasladarse hacia su trabajo, porque recorre varios kilómetros.

Katy, sueña con ahorrar mucho para poder comprar un vehículo.
texts.en:
Katy is 30 years old and a cosmetician.  She studied up to the seventh grade.  She did not continue with her studies because she decided to be in a relationship. She and her life partner have two children.  One is 9 years old and the other is 5 years old.  Only one of them is in school.  Her partner works as a day-labourer.

Katy works selling beauty products in and around her community.  She has been doing this for several years.  She decided to do it in order to help her husband with the family expenses.  She works from 1:00 to 4:00 selling her products.

The loan that she is requesting is to supplement the money to buy a motorcycle so that her husband can get to work because he has to travel several kilometres.

Katy dreams of saving a lot to be able to buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to supplement the money to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Saul

texts.pt:
O senhor Saul de 47 anos de idade, casado, comerciante vendendo diversos produtos de primeira necessidade, pai de 5 filhos dos quais 1 já  maior de idade e independente, 2 frequentam o ensino técnico e 2 frequentam o ensino primário, vive em casa própria.

Com o valor do credito pretende comprar, ovos, açúcar, caldo, farinha de milho, cervejas, e carne diversa para ampliar o seu negocio.
O cliente tem como sonho ampliar o seu negocio para satisfazer as necessidades dos seus clientes, abrir mais um estabelecimento e futuramente comprar um transporte maior para facilitar o seu negocio.
Os principais desafios são financeiros luta para trazer o seu negocio a normalidade por isso tem estado a trabalhar pretende tomar mais vezes o credito para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos.
texts.en:
Mr Saul is 47 years old, married and a trader, selling various essential products. He's the father of 5 children, 1 of whom is of age and independent, 2 who go to a technical college and 2 who are in school. He lives in a house he owns.

With this loan he plans to buy eggs, sugar, broth, corn flour, beers and various types of meat to expand his business.

He dreams of expanding his business and satisfying the needs of his customers, of opening another establishment and in future of purchasing a means of transport to facilitate his business.
His main challenges are financial and he fights to keep his business on an even keel. He plans to take out more loans to overcome his difficulties and reach his objectives.

loans.use: Compra de ovos, açúcar, caldo, farinha de milho, cervejas, e carne diversa para ampliar o seu negocio.

loans.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es: Luis Carlos tiene la edad  de 27 años, está casado vive con la esposa . Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos de asistencia para el café, además de comprar algunas plantas de almácigo para hacer resiembras a inicio de lluvias esto con el objetivo de aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Luis Carlos is 27, married and lives with his wife. He is planning to use the loan to buy fertilizers, fungicide and pay for the workforce that will help him with the coffee. In addition, he will also buy some coffee seedlings to replant at the beginning of the rainy season. 

His aim is to increase the density of plants per area as well as making the most of the good fertility of the soil and the weather conditions and others that favour coffee growing. He hopes to obtain some income thanks to this farming improvements and thus be able to improve the living conditions of his family. In addition, he hopes to invest a bit more in the cultivation area and also to achieve some goals.

This is the first loan he receives from FUDECOSUR. He never had a loan from a national bank, but  FUDECOSUR has given him the loan more easily and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Ezra

texts.en:
Ezra is 30 years old and lives in the town of Kasubi in the Kampala region of Uganda. He is married and has four children who are all currently in school. For the past two years, Ezra has been working hard to manage his stationery shop, which sells stationery items.

To help expand his business, Ezra has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more stationery items, and will help Ezra to generate greater profits and increase income. Ezra hopes that in the future he will be able to have a bigger stationery shop.

loans.use: to buy more stationery items.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
La socia Justina se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de  verduras y tambien negocio de venta de maiz, por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante, la socia es una mujer emprendedora, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de  verduras. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar  cebollas, zapallos y zanahorias.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Justina, still works in her business selling vegetables as well as corn.  She wants to get ahead with this business.  She's an enterprising woman whose dream is to expand her vegetable sales.

She's requesting the loan to buy onions, squash, and carrots.

Justina's happy about the loan and promises to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy onions, squash, and carrots

loans.name: Maria Dominga

texts.es:
Maria Dominga es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora que le agradece a usted el apoyo brindado pues gracias al crédito ella pudo comprar sus semillas y fertilizantes y gracias a Dios obtuvo muy buenas ganancias,  y para seguir prosperando ahora solicita un nuevo préstamo para poder comprar  semillas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de esta temporada.
Maria Dominga espera contar con este préstamo para poder mejorar sus ingresos y construir una casa más grande para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria Dominga is a very hard-working and determined woman who is grateful to you for the help given since thanks to the loan she was able to buy seeds and fertilizer.  She is thankful to God that she had good earnings. 

In order to continue prospering she is now requesting a new loan to be able to buy seeds and fertilizer for this season's crop.  Maria Dominga hopes to have this loan to be able to improve her income and to build a bigger house for her children.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Safaa

texts.en: Safaa is a widow and is financially responsible for five daughters and three sons. Her husband's pension income cannot cover the family's monthly expenses. Two years ago, she started a grocery and toy store project. After her project became very successful, she requested a 4,000 EGP loan to buy grocery products such as oil, pasta and rice to increase her sales for her family.

loans.use: To buy grocery products such as oil, pasta and rice to increase her sales for her family.

loans.name: Jose Medardo

texts.es: Don Jose de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la carpintería desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el quiere mejorar su vivienda, colocando las puertas y ventanas, pero como no tiene de suficiente capital está solicitando un crédito para la compra de las puertas, ventas y pago de mano de obra y asi poder vivir con su familia mas seguros y cómodos.
texts.en:
José, 59, lives in his own home with his wife.  He has earned a living as a carpenter for a long time, and he's able to pay for some of his household expenses with what he earns from his work.

He wants to install doors and windows to improve his house.  He doesn't have enough capital, though, so he's requesting a loan to buy doors and windows, and to pay for labor.  That way he and his family will be able to live more securely and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Luz Mery

texts.es:
La socia Luz Mery se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura y ganaderia,la socia tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales menores, la socia tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra maiz y papa, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de agricultura. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Luz Mery, still works in her farming and ranching business as well as selling small animals.  She has a plot of land where she grows corn and potatoes, and she works from 8 a.m. until 6 p.m.  She has been in this business for several years and it's going very well for her.  Her dream is to expand her farming business.

Luz Mery is requesting the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer.

She's happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en:
Ofelia is 39 years old and married with three children.

Ofelia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Ofelia has been in this business for six years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Ofelia aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.
